fileSamples.statement: (INIT : (fun a : actid => is_init a) ⊆₁ E_t) : (fun a : actid => is_init a) ⊆₁ mapper ↑₁ (fun a : actid => is_init a).
fileSamples.proofString: apply (fixset_set_fixpoint (sico_init SICO)).

fileSamples.statement: mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ rf_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ (mapper ↑₁ E_t) × (mapper ↑₁ E_t).
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ co_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ (mapper ↑₁ E_t) × (mapper ↑₁ E_t).
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ rmw_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ (mapper ↑₁ E_t) × (mapper ↑₁ E_t).
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: (e : actid) (INE : E_t e) : (lab_s ∘ mapper) e = lab_s (mapper e).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold compose.
reflexivity.

fileSamples.statement: (e : actid) (INE : E_t e) : lab_s (mapper e) = lab_s (mapper e).
fileSamples.proofString: reflexivity.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) : mapper ↑₁ E_t ∩₁ R_s ⊆₁ codom_rel (mapper ↑ rf_t).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite <- set_collect_codom, <- RFC.
unfolder.
intros x ((x' & INE & XEQ) & ISR).
exists x'.
splits; auto.
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) : mapper ↑₁ E_t ∩₁ R_s ⊆₁ mapper ↑₁ (E_t ∩₁ R_t).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfolder.
intros x ((x' & INE & XEQ) & ISR).
exists x'.
splits; auto.
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) : forall x : actid,
(exists y : actid, E_t y /\ mapper y = x) /\ is_r lab_s x ->
exists y : actid, (E_t y /\ is_r lab_t y) /\ mapper y = x.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros x ((x' & INE & XEQ) & ISR).
exists x'.
splits; auto.
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) (x x' : actid) (INE : E_t x') (XEQ : mapper x' = x) (ISR : is_r lab_s x) : exists y : actid, (E_t y /\ is_r lab_t y) /\ mapper y = x.
fileSamples.proofString:
exists x'.
splits; auto.
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) (x x' : actid) (INE : E_t x') (XEQ : mapper x' = x) (ISR : is_r lab_s x) : (E_t x' /\ is_r lab_t x') /\ mapper x' = x.
fileSamples.proofString:
splits; auto.
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) (x x' : actid) (INE : E_t x') (XEQ : mapper x' = x) (ISR : is_r lab_s x) : is_r lab_t x'.
fileSamples.proofString:
subst x.
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (RFC : E_t ∩₁ R_t ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) (x' : actid) (INE : E_t x') (ISR : is_r lab_s (mapper x')) : is_r lab_t x'.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold is_r in *.
rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(RFC : E_t
∩₁ (fun a : actid =>
    match lab_t a with
    | Aload _ _ _ _ => true
    | _ => false
    end) ⊆₁ codom_rel rf_t) (x' : actid) (INE : E_t x') (ISR : match lab_s (mapper x') with
| Aload _ _ _ _ => true
| _ => false
end) : match lab_t x' with
| Aload _ _ _ _ => true
| _ => false
end.
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ (⦗W_t⦘ ⨾ rf_t ⨾ ⦗R_t⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ W_s × R_s.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfolder.
ins.
desf.
unfold is_w, is_r in *.
rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement:
forall x y : actid,
(exists x' y' : actid,
   ((E_t x' /\ is_w lab_t x') /\ rf_t x' y' /\ is_r lab_t y' /\ E_t y') /\
   mapper x' = x /\ mapper y' = y) -> is_w lab_s x /\ is_r lab_s y.
fileSamples.proofString:
ins.
desf.
unfold is_w, is_r in *.
rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(x y : actid) (H : exists x' y' : actid,
  ((E_t x' /\ is_w lab_t x') /\ rf_t x' y' /\ is_r lab_t y' /\ E_t y') /\
  mapper x' = x /\ mapper y' = y) : is_w lab_s x /\ is_r lab_s y.
fileSamples.proofString:
desf.
unfold is_w, is_r in *.
rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: (x' y' : actid) (H : E_t x') (H5 : is_w lab_t x') (H2 : rf_t x' y') (H3 : is_r lab_t y') (H4 : E_t y') : is_w lab_s (mapper x') /\ is_r lab_s (mapper y').
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold is_w, is_r in *.
rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ same_loc_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ same_loc_s.

same_loc_s x y.
fileSamples.proofString:
ins.
desf.

rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement:
(x' y' : actid) (H : E_t x') (H2 : match lab_t x' with
| Aload _ _ l _ | Astore _ _ l _ => Some l
| Afence _ => None
end =
match lab_t y' with
| Aload _ _ l _ | Astore _ _ l _ => Some l
| Afence _ => None
end) (H3 : E_t y') : match lab_s (mapper x') with
| Aload _ _ l _ | Astore _ _ l _ => Some l
| Afence _ => None
end =
match lab_s (mapper y') with
| Aload _ _ l _ | Astore _ _ l _ => Some l
| Afence _ => None
end.
fileSamples.proofString: rewrite <- !sico_lab'; auto.

fileSamples.statement: functional (mapper ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ rf_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘))⁻¹.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite <- collect_rel_transp, <- restr_relE,          <- restr_transp.
apply functional_collect_rel_inj; [apply SICO|].
rewrite restr_transp, restr_relE, <- (wf_rfE WF_T).
apply WF_T.

fileSamples.statement: functional (mapper ↑ restr_rel E_t rf_t⁻¹).
fileSamples.proofString:

apply WF_T.

fileSamples.statement: functional rf_t⁻¹.

fileSamples.statement: (e e' : actid) (s : actid -> Prop) (NINE : ~ E_t e) (SET : s ⊆₁ E_t) : eq_dom s (upd mapper e e') mapper.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite SET.
unfolder.
intros.
now rewrite updo by congruence.

fileSamples.statement: (e e' : actid) (s : actid -> Prop) (NINE : ~ E_t e) (SET : s ⊆₁ E_t) : eq_dom E_t (upd mapper e e') mapper.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfolder.
intros.
now rewrite updo by congruence.

fileSamples.statement: (e e' : actid) (s : actid -> Prop) (NINE : ~ E_t e) (SET : s ⊆₁ E_t) : forall x : actid, E_t x -> upd mapper e e' x = mapper x.
fileSamples.proofString:
intros.
now rewrite updo by congruence.

fileSamples.statement: (e e' : actid) (s : actid -> Prop) (NINE : ~ E_t e) (SET : s ⊆₁ E_t) (x : actid) (DX : E_t x) : upd mapper e e' x = mapper x.
fileSamples.proofString: now rewrite updo by congruence.
